pullRequest.title: Ports last docker tests to jupiter
pullRequest.bodyText:
This cleans up testcontainers fixtures and ports the two remaining
docker tests to jupiter (kafka and rabbit).

commit.message:
Ports last docker tests to jupiter

This cleans up testcontainers fixtures and ports the two remaining
docker tests to jupiter (kafka and rabbit).

nodes.bodyText: most of the simplification here is dropping support of local connections (docker only now)
Doesn't hurt but just curious, is producer ever null?
It's slightly nerve-racking to use the same spans for both. But that's not special to this PR anyways
